This class contains the implementation of a generic Bloom filter.

Constructs a new Bloom filter from its byte representation.

BloomFilterBuilder - Class in skip
This program reads a binary file containing a list of keys and outputs a binary file with a list of Bloom filters.
BloomFilterBuilder() - Constructor for class skip.BloomFilterBuilder
 
BloomFilterBuilderExt - Class in skip
This programs behaves similarly to BloomFilterBuilder, as it constructs a binary file containing Bloom filters that summarize the keys included in the input blocks.

skip - package skip
 
skip - Variable in class skip.BlockIndex
BF skip index for the block.
Skip - Class in skip
This class contains the implementation of the BF skip index, a data structure based on Bloom filters for answering inter-block queries on blockchains in an efficient way.
Skip(int, int) - Constructor for class skip.Skip
Constructs a new BF skip index with the given number of entries and filter size.
Skip(BloomFilter[]) - Constructor for class skip.Skip
Constructs a new BF skip index from the given array of filters.
